name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayConvertHandler
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
  type: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(stripwith(ri!field, "1234567890")),
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer',
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  ),
  value: ri!field
)
